page.title: 14Shopping in Wheelock 2
page.content: Mrs Grimes thought shopping in Wheelock had changed nowadays because the roads are so busy,( we counted over 500 vehicles an hour on Crewe Road ). When we went down to the village to count the shops and find out all the names there were lorries on the path and it was frightening because of the traffic coming whizzing past. Now there is Mrs Grimes the greengrocer, Pete Hardy the butcher, Harper's Village Stores, Austin's Newsagents, the Post Office which is run by Mrs Johnson and the Golden Harvest Chinese chip shop. Most people do a 'big shop' at the supermarkets in Sandbach and Crewe and only go down to the village for little things. Some of the people in the village don't go down to the village at all.
